mods.note: - in.. _ ROUGH HAHD SKETCH SHOWUfG PROBABLE RIVER SYSTEM HEAR MOHAMMERAH IBOUT 1750

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'ROUGH SKETCH SHOWING PROBABLE RIVER SYSTEM NEAR MOHAMMERAH ABOUT 1750.'

mods.abstract: Sketch of the river system near Mohammerah [Khorramshahr] with coastlines and rivers drawn in pencil and place names typed over the drawing. Names of rivers have been written in ink.The sketch was included in notes on Alwyn Parker's memorandum respecting the frontier between Mohammerah and Turkey, written by Sir Percy Zachariah Cox.
